rules_text:
When Swordhand Squire dies, unsheath. [i](Create a colorless Weapon artifact equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+1” and “Equip {1}.”)[/i]
Blitz {2}{W} [i](If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and “When this creature dies, draw a card”. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)[/i]
